alert.note: Alert for Banks; Hall; Jackson; Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 1:34AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Banks, southeastern Hall, Jackson and northwestern Madison Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 132 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Mount Airy to near Gillsville to near Flowery Branch, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Jefferson, Commerce, Homer, Flowery Branch, Oakwood, Lula, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Pendergrass, Gillsville, Talmo, Candler, Peach State Speedway, Pinefield Crossroads, Chestnut Mountain, Apple Valley, Hollingsworth and Banks Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
